models.linear_regression package¶

Submodules¶

models.linear_regression.linear_regression module¶

Linear regression model definitions

methods * linear_regression(X: np.ndarray, y: np.ndarray, one_column: bool): trains a linear regression model from given data

models.linear_regression.linear_regression.linear_regression(X: ndarray, y: ndarray, one_column: bool) → ndarray[source]¶

apply linear regression on a given set of data

Parameters:

  • X – design matrix in format X = (1 x1 x2 …) size = n x (p+1) or X = (x1 x2 …) size = n x p

  • y – training data response vector

  • one_column – set False if the input design matrix lacks the leading one column to add it in post

Returns:

linear regression (the least squares) parameters (intercept, B1, B2, …, Bp)

Return type:

np.ndarray

Module contents¶

Linear regression model library
